A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Speaking as an OG Star Wars fan (I saw it 14 times in 1977)\, this is a good movie. Characters do unexpected things\, plans go wrong; it does not end the way you think it will.

It's not a perfect movie; it meanders at points and some scenes go on too long\, but at no point was my childhood ruined. Pay no attention to the sad fanboys who tender such complaints; these aren't the nerds you're looking for. 

Honestly\, I love Star Wars. I've never NOT seen a Star Wars movie in the theater. After a lifetime of 'safe' Star Wars films that took few chances\, TLJ is a window thrown open in a room full of stale air. Take a deep breath and let the past die.
